1.title: StartCoding.org
1.description: A place to discover and share coding resources. Built with React and MongoDB. We ditched the flux pattern in favor of a lighter custom-built store/event emitter. DIY react router. Recursive comment components. Lots of fun!

2.title: Wiki Guide
2.description: Discover the best Wikipedia near you. Uses a rating system to show the most interesting articles in your proximity. You can like or strike on a given article, browse wikipedia, and view all your favorites. Great for travel. A MEAN stack app.

3.title: Green It Forums
3.description: A Reddit-inspired forum app that allows users to post content, comment, and vote. Viewed links turn green! The frontend is written with React, and the backend uses Node.js/Express, and MongoDB

4.title: Tower of Hanoi
4.description: The classic Tower of Hanoi game. Written using jQuery.
